name: Bamboozle
description:
Day 1374 of recon.

The big hairless creatures still haven’t realised a superior being is among them. My research has shown they used to worship my kin with grand temples and sacrifice. They don’t do that anymore. They make me eat out of a bowl and call me Pickles the Chunky Fluffness. 

They pick up my poop with a little shovel, though. That’s good.

The naked simpletons scratch my cheek and sometimes I forget the might of my people. The confusion is overbearing! I must do something to bamboozle these peasants…

// Bamboozled is the final project for the course Game Theory & Design at Arcada University of Applied Sciences, Helsinki, Finland. The team behind the game consists of a producer, graphic designer and game designer, proudly presenting their fluffy brainchild.

The game is made with GameMaker Studio 2.
